title: No domestic LP gas distribution tomorrow as well - Litro
body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka says the distribution of domestic LP gas cylinders will not be carried out tomorrow (May 27) as well.
The company, therefore, appealed to the consumers not to wait in gas queues throughout tomorrow.
Accordingly, tomorrow will be the fourth consecutive day that domestic gas cylinders (12.5kg, 5kg and 2.3kg) are not distributed the island-wide.
